Title: Grace
Plot: Carrie continues to surveil Brody but is unable to follow his actions into his garage which is a blind spot, where Brody begins to perform an Islamic prayer. Meanwhile, Carrie receives visual confirmation from an undercover agent that shows Al-Qaeda member Abu Nazir on video meeting with the Royal Prince of the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sex scenes
GuestStars: Michael McKean, David Marciano, Maury Sterling, Navid Negahban, Amy Hargreaves, Scott Bryce, Amir Arison, Brianna Brown
